short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Formats greentext-style tweets to look like 4chan greentext

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Twitter experience with 4chan-style greentext formatting. This extension automatically detects and styles tweets containing greentext (lines starting with '>'), giving them a distinct look reminiscent of 4chan posts.

Features:
• Automatically formats greentext in tweets
• Choose between two background styles: classic blue or warm red
• Applies 4chan-like font styling to tweets with greentext

Note: This extension is not affiliated with Twitter, X, or 4chan.
